name: KARTMania
description:
Overview


"KARTmania" is a realistic racing kart game.
Setting changes such as seat position and sprocket length,
Let's capture the circuit course with driving technique!

Play flow


There are two modes to choose from: a race mode in which 6 karts compete for ranking, and a time attack mode in which the fastest time is competed.
If you win the podium in race mode, the number of courses you can choose for races and time attacks will increase.
In time attack mode, you will run alone and aim to update the fastest time, but the current fastest time is
Since it is displayed as a ghost, you can enjoy the excitement of the race.
You can also see the world ranking on the leaderboard!
Change the settings to adjust to the best machine and aim for the fastest time!
